Text: how do i play it with english subtitles? it downloaded three files, one avi with the movie, two others 'eng.srt' and .pt.srt. how do i play it with the eng subtitles? the avi file only plays without any subtitles..

dglazer1

All U need to do is to install MPC HC ( here is link: http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/download-media-player-classic-hc.html ) which will allow U to open subs in almost ANY format ;)
Cheers
